name: fifties
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 A person's fifties are the period in which they are aged between 50 and 59: in your fifties My dad's in his fifties. the fifties
the range of temperature between 50° and 59°: in the fifties It's been in the fifties all week.
B2 the decade (= period of ten years) between 50 and 59 in any century, usually 1950–1959: in the fifties Rock and roll first became popular in the fifties.

Add to word list
the numbers 50 through 59: The temperature has been in the fifties (= between 50° and 59°). My dad is in his fifties (= between 50 and 59 years old).
The fifties are the years between 1950 and 1959.
